blockgametooltips.config.title: Blockgame Tooltips
blockgametooltips.key.show.tooltip: Shows a more detailed list of item stats when hovering over an item
blockgametooltips.key.showMinMaxValues.t: Shows the minimum and maximum value ranges when hovering over an item
blockgametooltips.key.tooltipType.toolti:
Changes the type of tooltip shown when hovering over an item
- Inline: Shows the tooltip in the item's tooltip
- Window: Shows the tooltip in a separate window
